t:
“Wake up, Sherlock. You're in danger. There's a man with a knife downstairs.”


     “Stop barking, Tiger. It's 2AM.
   I'll take you out in the morning.”
c:
If only we could understand them.



#intruder #murderer #homealone #pets #dog #tryingtosave #loyal #cantunderstand





The first line is by a dog. The second line is by his master.
